short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds product video reviews to Amazon product pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically embeds video product reviews on all Amazon.com product pages, so you can watch product reviews and demos from real people without leaving the page. Video reviews are a great way to help decide you should buy the product.
